snippet: Stephen Curry and LeBron James, in town to play in the N.B.A. All-Star Game this weekend, hosted a children’s fitness clinic in Manhattan.
abstract: NBA Roundup; NBA stars LeBron James and Stephen Curry host basketball clinic for children at Hell's Kitchen high school, one of dozens of similar events that NBA held at schools across New York City over All-Star weekend; other basketball news noted.

byline.original: By ZACH SCHONBRUN and ANDREW KEH

lead_paragraph: Stephen Curry and LeBron James, in town to play in the N.B.A. All-Star Game this weekend, hosted a children’s fitness clinic in Manhattan.

headline.seo: LeBron James and Stephen Curry Host Fitness Clinic in Manhattan
headline.main: League’s Visiting Stars Draw a Crowd and Leave a Sense of Longing
headline.print_headline: A League’s Visiting Stars Draw a Crowd and Leave a Sense of Longing
